channel.title: Big problem
channel.description:
Ok so basically I am using the matrix client+source and and I get this when i run the client "error_game_js5connect" and then when I run it in the source it says: 'Error: missing `server' JVM at `C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll'. Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. Press any key to continue . . .'
Also this is whats in the run.bat: @echo off @title Running Server java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true pause
So if anyone can help me that would be great if you need me to show you anything eles please let me know! :)

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @Abbyys Abbyys
item.description:
@Abbyys wrote:

@echo off
title Matrix
echo Launching Illumina…
“C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe” -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false
pause

Try that

Read full topic

item.title: Big problem
item.dc:creator: @i_want_fire i want fire
item.description:
@i_want_fire wrote:

Ok so basically I am using the matrix client+source and and I get this when i run the client “error_game_js5connect” and then when I run it in the source it says: ‘Error: missing server' JVM atC:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\server\jvm.dll’.
Please install or use the JRE or JDK that contains these missing components.
Press any key to continue . . .’

Also this is whats in the run.bat: @echo off
@title Running Server
java -XX:-OmitStackTraceInFastThrow -server -Xms2048m -Xmx4096m -cp bin;data/libs/netty-3.5.2.Final.jar;data/libs/FileStore.jar com.rs.Launcher false false true
pause

So if anyone can help me that would be great if you need me to show you anything eles please let me know!
